@template access

{{html:
<div class="account-container stacked" ng-app="cloudscalers" ng-controller="SessionController">
    <div class="content clearfix padding">
        <form ng-submit="login()">
            <h1>Sign In</h1>

            <div class="login-fields">

                <p>Sign in using your registered account:</p>
                <div class="alert alert-error ng-hide" ng-show="login_error">Please enter the correct username & password.</div>
                <div class="field">
                    <label for="username">Username:</label>
                    <div class="input-prepend">
  						<span class="add-on"><i class="icon-user"></i></span>
                    	<input type="text" id="username" value="" placeholder="Username" ng-model="user.username" />
					</div>
                </div>
                <div class="field">
                    <label for="password">Password:</label>
                    <div class="input-prepend">
  						<span class="add-on"><i class="icon-lock"></i></span>
                   		<input type="password" id="password_field" name="" value="" placeholder="Password" ng-model="user.password"/>
                   	</div>
                </div>
            </div>

            <div class="login-actions">
                <input type="submit" class="button btn  btn-primary btn-large" value="Login" />
            </div>
			<p class="sp"><span>Or</span></p> <hr>
			<a class="btn long-btn" href="/$$space/SignUp">Sign Up</a>
        </form>
    </div>
</div>
}}
